valueFormat.typescript: Array<{ label: string; value: string | number; disabled?: boolean; }>
valueFormat.example: :options="[{ label: 'Option 1', value: '1' }, { label: 'Option 2', value: '2', disabled: true }]"

commonMistakes.mistake: Using 'text' instead of 'label' for option display
commonMistakes.correction: V1 uses 'label' property for option text

customOptionsKey.description: Custom property name for option label

commonMistakes.mistake: Not setting when options have different label key
commonMistakes.correction: Set customOptionsKey when options use 'name' or other key instead of 'label'

fetchUrl.description: API endpoint for fetching options dynamically

responseKey.description: JSON path to options array in API response

maxSelectableItem.description: Maximum number of items that can be selected

addNewTagStatus.description: Allow creating new options by typing

minimumNewTagCharacterLimit.description: Minimum characters required for new tag

maxNewTagCharacterLimit.description: Maximum characters allowed for new tag

hasTemporaryOptions.description: Allow temporary options that aren't persisted

addNewOption.description: Emitted when new option is created

exampleEnrichments.title: Basic Multi-Select
exampleEnrichments.code:
<InMultiDropDown
  id="categories"
  label="Categories"
  placeholder="Select categories"
  :options="[
    { label: 'Technology', value: 'tech' },
    { label: 'Business', value: 'business' },
    { label: 'Design', value: 'design' }
  ]"
  v-model="selectedCategories"
  @change="handleChange"
/>

exampleEnrichments.title: With API Fetch
exampleEnrichments.code:
<InMultiDropDown
  id="users"
  label="Assign Users"
  fetch-url="/api/users"
  response-key="data.users"
  query-string="search"
  search-status
  search-placeholder="Search users..."
  v-model="assignedUsers"
  @search="handleSearch"
/>

exampleEnrichments.title: With New Tag Creation
exampleEnrichments.code:
<InMultiDropDown
  id="tags"
  label="Tags"
  type="tags"
  :options="availableTags"
  v-model="selectedTags"
  add-new-tag-status
  :minimum-new-tag-character-limit="2"
  :max-new-tag-character-limit="30"
  new-option-text="Create tag"
  @add-new-option="createTag"
/>

commonMistakes.mistake: Not setting responseKey for API fetch
commonMistakes.solution: Set response-key to match your API response structure

commonMistakes.mistake: Using disable instead of disabled in options

bestPractices.practice: Use searchStatus for large option lists
bestPractices.description: Enable search when options > 10 for better UX
Use warningMessage and invalidMessage for user feedback
bestPractices.example: invalid invalid-message="Please select at least one option"
